document_title: Breast enlargement: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
This is a question of concern for women when encountering this disease, does breast enlargement affect their health and cause any complications? In fact, 80% of breast enlargement does not cause any pain or damage to the patient. However, breast enlargement has many negative consequences, affecting aesthetics and potentially many health risks.
Loss of aesthetics: Large, sagging breasts; An unbalanced body makes women lose self-esteem and feel guilty; Shoulder and neck pain, back pain, arm numbness, headache...; The lumbar spine tends to curve forward; Choosing the right outfit and bra is difficult; Difficulties and inconveniences in daily life; Feeling of difficulty breathing; Easy to lose sensation in the nipples; Nipples are often enlarged; Breast fold ulcers...; Breast skin is stretched and loose; Rash on the skin around the breast
Breast enlargement causes loss of aesthetics and has many potential health hazards
